Configure AOSP options for lockscreen & ambient display
Add or remove visual elements of your lockscreen

You are not limited to the pre-installed weather icon packages. Search the Google PlayStore with the keyword "chronus icons" and you will find a lot of additional packages.
Configure settings related to the FOD view
To use your own static FOD icon, use the OPFP app. Make sure to have the animated FOD icon disabled when using a custom icon in OPFP.
You can download your own custom FOD icon PNGs from Telegram channels such as FODicons and OP_fps. Use a local gallery and not online services such as Google Photos to pick FOD icons.
Set custom animations for certain transitions
List of recent commits added to DerpFest
Configure the LED light for supported options
However, new features may be added here soon. Check back after future updates!
A little info about the team
Tap here to open our wonderful community!
Tap here to open our Github!

This is a small project based on AOSP. We try to be a platform for beginners and support the Custom ROM community with our own unique contributions as well. This ROM exists thanks to inspiration of AOSiP, Thank you!
This feature requires a SystemUI restart to be applied. We\'ll restart the SystemUI right now.
